Functions

Function(s) admin.is_index.
return true when there is an index p_index on the table p_schema.p_table. false otherwise. example: select admin.is_index('oms','User2OrganizationDO','User2OrganizationDO_user_idx');

FUNCTION admin.is_index ( p_shema character varying, p_table character varying, p_index character varying ) RETURNS boolean LANGUAGE 'sql' volatile;
